thread.title: Paul Crugnola Joins Outer Banks Real Estate Firm Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty
thread.title_full: Paul Crugnola Joins Outer Banks Real Estate Firm Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty

author: Pamela Smith
title: Paul Crugnola Joins Outer Banks Real Estate Firm Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty
text:
Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty, a Leading Outer Banks real estate firm, announces Paul Crugnola has joined the firm's Kitty Hawk, North Carolina office. A native of the Boston, MA area, Paul graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and spent several years as a Software and Quality Assurance Manager for Telecommunications, Data and Video Networking and IT companies in both the Boston and Minneapolis areas. Paul has been vacationing in the Outer Banks for over 30 years with his wife Katie and three daughters, and three years ago they decided to buy a home in Colington Harbour. Last fall, Paul and Katie moved to the Outer Banks on a full-time basis and Paul decided to take a new and exciting direction in the field of real estate. After recently passing the NC Real Estate exam, Paul signed on with Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty, the same firm which helped him find a home here on the Outer Banks.
“I am looking forward to working with Paul, a fellow Bostonian!” says Pamela Smith, Vice President of Sales for Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty.
Paul enjoys his two puppies, along with golf and boating on the sound. Paul currently serves as a volunteer for US Figure Skating as both a Music and Announcing Official, traveling to different parts of the country to help with figure skating competitions.
Paul can be reached at (252) 564-4768 or Paul(at)cbseaside(dot)com
About Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty:
Founded in Kitty Hawk, NC in 1990, Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty is a leading Outer Banks real estate firm. Coldwell Banker Seaside Realty provides both residential and commercial buying and selling assistance in northeastern North Carolina.
For information about Outer Banks real estate, visit http://www.cbseaside.com or call 252.261.3800 to speak with one of their highly experienced real estate professionals.
